name: Parvus Arena
description:
This is just a prototype of an idea I had for some time. I made it in less than 24 hours using Construct 2 and various free assets pack on Itch.io.

* HOW TO PLAY *

Player 1: Keyboard (arrows and CTRL for shooting)

Player 2: Keyboard (W for jump, A for left, D for right, H for shooting) or using Gamepad (analog for left and right, X for jump, right shoulder button for shooting)
